items.sentence: You know Tom will never let you live this down, right?
Tom slipped on the wet grass and fell on his backside.
What would you like to do while you're here in Boston?
He couldn't fulfill the promise he made to his father.
Neither Tom nor Mary has spent much time in Australia.
Tom went to Australia to help his uncle build a house.
Don't forget that I have a lot more money than you do.
It's too bad that Tom couldn't attend today's meeting.
Tom lost control of his vehicle and hit the guardrail.
Yesterday, Tom got a letter from an old friend of his.
